snippet: SPATZ--Ilse, born January 29, 1930, died June 5, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Werner Spatz. Adored mother of David and Linda and Sherrill and Rob. Cherished grandmother (and Oma) of Hana, Emma, Alex and Zoe. Honored sister of Bea Roberg. She taught us how to live life to the fullest, overcome difficulties with grace and without complaint and the importance of faith and giving back to your community without the expectation of praise. She will be in our hearts forever. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SPATZ--Ilse, born January 29, 1930, died June 5, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Werner Spatz. Adored mother of David and Linda and Sherrill and Rob. Cherished grandmother (and Oma) of Hana, Emma, Alex and Zoe. Honored sister of Bea Roberg. She taught us how to live life to the fullest, overcome difficulties with grace and without complaint and the importance of faith and giving back to your community without the expectation of praise. She will be in our hearts forever. 1/3
